Fortune.title: 2019 OVERVIEW
Fortune.content: This year, destiny can take charge of your life! Circumstances out of your control can create shifts and unexpectedly changes. Nothing is impossible now - stay positive. What happens next promises to be better than you could ever imagine.

Fortune.title: LOVE
Fortune.content: Whether you are in a relationship or looking for love, trusting someone to share your most intimate details with is very much part of this yearâ€™s love lesson. A magnetic connection with someone amazing can provide a safe feeling of closeness, belonging and attachment.

Fortune.title: CAREER
Fortune.content: Lucky connections with friends and colleagues can move your career up the ladder of success. Chance meetings with influential people can make a significant difference in your work life.

Fortune.title: MONEY
Fortune.content: Educate yourself about money, how to manage your finances and in particular how to save and invest. The more savings you have the safer you feel.

Fortune.title: SPIRIT
Fortune.content: Self-development is the key to get to know yourself on a deeper level.
